column2: In secret, the [qarmatian.GetName] faithful have organized around a small community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects its own.
In this society, secret followers of the [qarmatian.GetName] religion try to advance their true faith and hope to one day be able to openly adopt it.
The High Priest, leading the international effort of bringing more people into the fold.
The §Y[bogomilist.GetName]§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
